desc: Buy a Candle. Support Drug Recovery. Support Drug Rehab. We arxe a faith-based rehab. Our hand-crafted candles are one way we raise the funds to operate a free faith-based rehab. 3R Candles.

layout.text: Candles with a Strong Scent and a Strong Purpose...

Each Candle is Delicately Hand-Crafted by
Men in Drug & Alcohol Recovery.
You can Feel Good, Knowing that Your Purchase Helps to
Transform a Life, a Family, and Future Generations.
